BE MY GUEST 2/91#49[Can]
programme.sub-title: 安兒考察完畢返港,發現家裡被劍笙與樂兒弄得一塌糊塗,千辛萬苦才執拾至回復正常。安兒在洪都拉斯結識一中國女子婷婷,欣賞其爽朗性格,話甚投契。婷婷欠下安兒房租錢,決跟隨至香港,賺夠錢還給安兒後,再打算流浪至另一目的地,暫住
programme.desc: 在方家。其實婷婷為大馬富商之女,因其父反對她四處流浪,一直對其經濟封鎖。婷婷不甘被束縛,決自力更生。

programme.title: 浮世雙嬌傳#7[粵/普][PG]
Legend of Two Sisters in the Chaos#7[Can/Man][PG]
programme.sub-title: 晉王前往福寧宮求見陛下, 被懷瑾擋在殿外, 陛下一向龍體欠安, 可從未聽聞因病而拒見大臣, 晉王覺得事有蹊蹺。符大小姐在轎子裡中毒昏迷, 金盞換上嫁衣和薛榮拜堂, 長公主親自來賀婚, 說要親自為薛家新婦插上鳳
programme.desc: 頭釵。

programme.title: 新派煮意[粵]
My Private Kitchen[Can]
programme.sub-title: 韋兆嫻(Denice)這次特別呈獻兩道木瓜菜式。她強調「木瓜雜菜沙律」是做法簡單的前菜,不需經火烹調。當中以白酒醋、檸檬汁及黃芥末等拌勻而成的醬汁,可令人胃口大開!此外,Denice還分享把西柚快速起肉的心得。羊肉的味道較為濃
programme.desc: 烈,Denice配上味道清新的木瓜作中和,煮出「燒羊扒配木瓜芫荽醬」。期間,她示範把木瓜去皮的正確刀法。醃製羊扒時,Denice特意選用一種印度混合香料,有甚麼作用?

programme.title: 輝哥為食遊[粵]
Raymond's Tastebuds[Can]
programme.sub-title: 節目第一集,「輝哥」吳錫輝和「糖妹」黃山怡前赴中山、潮汕等地「為食遊」。中山脆肉鯇魚肉質爽脆,有何飼養秘訣?名廚烹調脆鯇「一魚六吃」,以晶瑩剔透的魚片涮火鍋鮮味無比!汕頭魚丸香脆彈牙,採用甚麼魚製作?且看師傅施展「拍打功」絕
programme.desc: 技,炮製雪白圓滿手打魚丸。糖妹亦有樣學樣,鬼馬巧製「老人丸」孝敬輝哥!潮汕打冷堪稱潮式快餐,林林總總的海鮮生熟美食、鹵水小吃多達四百餘種;輝哥還順道細說兒時吃潮州粥的艱難日子。

programme.title: Only You 只有您#1[粵]
Only You#1[Can]
programme.sub-title: 麥一敏與母親張雪霞出席遠房表弟兼弟弟同事Eric的囍宴遭白眼,一敏遂把一鳴與富家女趙詠鳳飾相戀的事說出。雪霞得悉大妗姐莊思甜來頭不少,希望她能替一鳴與詠鳳主持婚禮。詠鳳對採用傳統中國禮儀不悅,但答應為了一鳴
programme.desc: 讓步。一敏被上司以控制成本不力為由開除,一鳴婚禮的開支頓變成百上加斤,要求思甜減價。思甜到雪霞家準備安床,一鳴姊弟卻發生爭執先後離開。一鳴與詠鳳為禮儀感煩悶,但思甜堅持傳統做法,為新人送上祝福。

programme.title: 櫻桃小丸子[粵/日]
Chibimaruko Chan (II)[Can/Jap]
programme.sub-title: 暑假即將完結,小丸子說希望時間可以停止。野口同學聽到之後,表示有辦法令時間停止。小丸子同朋友們一起玩的時候,遇上一個生面口的女孩。小丸子他們邀請女孩一起玩,女孩雖然答應了,但表現得很含蓄。

programme.title: Hands Up[粵]
Hands Up[Can]
programme.sub-title: 兒童節目《Hands Up》有「醬汁家族」成員和一眾主持,陪伴大家度過愉快時光。「Kids’ Notes」邀請不同界別人士,跟小朋友分享有趣事物;透過「零食小兵團」遊戲,讓孩子們快樂遊玩;運動教練引領大家「Workou
programme.desc: t 2gether」,鍛練身體;還會透過「Artspiration」,引領孩子了解藝術世界;「My Little Show」開放表演舞台,小朋友到來盡情展示才藝!

programme.title: 忍者亂太郎[粵/日]
Ninja Boy Rantaro (XXIV)[Can/Jap]
programme.sub-title: 庄左衛門他們在山中的小屋避雨時,發覺該處是山賊的家。為了幫伏木藏驅除睡意,三反田與川西開始說一些刺激及懸疑的事。出茂鹿之介為了成為忍術學園的事務員而前來拜訪。見此,校長給了他一些任務。

programme.sub-title: 報道本地、兩岸、國際重要新聞以及體育消息,讓你洞悉各地大事及體壇動向。

programme.title: 真相#7[粵]
The Other Truth#7[Can]
programme.sub-title: 啟航與榮財的案件因未能找到新證據,兩人被判罪名成立,少謙只好替父親保釋外出等候上訴。雯慧提議請伯勤回港出山助上訴。法官瑞馨因文瀚替偉通翻案對他有好印象,令其他大狀對文瀚另眼相看。偉通獲平反後,有街坊指可向政府索償,文瀚雖不情願
programme.desc: 卻只得答應幫忙。伯勤回港替啟航上訴,眾人日以繼夜研究謄本與供詞,但見伯勤心神恍惚,少謙不禁擔心......在上訴當天,伯勤突然向啟航夫婦表示自己不會擔任辯方律師,眾人一愕......

programme.title: 東張西望[粵]
Scoop[Can]
programme.sub-title: 《東張西望》星期一至日,緊貼追蹤社會大事、趣聞逸事,並報道娛樂圈最新動態、藝人消息,以及劇集宣傳和花絮。「今日突發」環節為大家追蹤即日熱門新聞;專題環節,深入探討大眾關心的時事、社會及民生問題,並訪問相關的專家。

programme.title: MUSIC BREAK[粵]
Music Break 2025[Can]
programme.sub-title: 星期一至五夜深時分,不妨Take個《MUSIC BREAK》。節目播放精心挑選、最新、勁歌金榜上榜的歌曲MV,優質音樂作品每集連環放送。觀眾同時可掃瞄螢幕上的二維碼,登入網上直播平台,與開Live主持即席討論,實
programme.desc: 時互動。

programme.title: 流行都市[粵]
Big City Shop[Can]
programme.sub-title: 《流行都市》為觀眾介紹時令產品、健康養生、健體運動、護膚化妝、時尚服飾、嬰幼兒護理、育兒知識、城中美食、飼養寵物等潮流資訊,內容包羅萬有!主持們親身體驗、示範或測試之外,還會邀請嘉賓帶來相關專業知識。烹飪環節方面,多位手勢了得
programme.desc: 的廚藝專家輪流登場,示範簡單美味的健康美食、家常小菜,替大家解決煮食煩惱。

programme.title: Only You 只有您#1[粵]
Only You#1[Can]
programme.sub-title: 麥一敏與母親張雪霞出席遠房表弟兼弟弟同事Eric的囍宴遭白眼,一敏遂把一鳴與富家女趙詠鳳飾相戀的事說出。雪霞得悉大妗姐莊思甜來頭不少,希望她能替一鳴與詠鳳主持婚禮。詠鳳對採用傳統中國禮儀不悅,但答應為了一鳴
programme.desc: 讓步。一敏被上司以控制成本不力為由開除,一鳴婚禮的開支頓變成百上加斤,要求思甜減價。思甜到雪霞家準備安床,一鳴姊弟卻發生爭執先後離開。一鳴與詠鳳為禮儀感煩悶,但思甜堅持傳統做法,為新人送上祝福。

programme.title: 我愛玫瑰園#49[粵]
BE MY GUEST 2/91#49[Can]
programme.sub-title: 安兒考察完畢返港,發現家裡被劍笙與樂兒弄得一塌糊塗,千辛萬苦才執拾至回復正常。安兒在洪都拉斯結識一中國女子婷婷,欣賞其爽朗性格,話甚投契。婷婷欠下安兒房租錢,決跟隨至香港,賺夠錢還給安兒後,再打算流浪至另一目的地,暫住
programme.desc: 在方家。其實婷婷為大馬富商之女,因其父反對她四處流浪,一直對其經濟封鎖。婷婷不甘被束縛,決自力更生。

programme.title: 浮世雙嬌傳#7[粵/普][PG]
Legend of Two Sisters in the Chaos#7[Can/Man][PG]
programme.sub-title: 晉王前往福寧宮求見陛下, 被懷瑾擋在殿外, 陛下一向龍體欠安, 可從未聽聞因病而拒見大臣, 晉王覺得事有蹊蹺。符大小姐在轎子裡中毒昏迷, 金盞換上嫁衣和薛榮拜堂, 長公主親自來賀婚, 說要親自為薛家新婦插上鳳
programme.desc: 頭釵。

programme.title: 街坊廚神[粵]
Neighborhood Gourmet[Can]
programme.sub-title: 經過一輪密集式的「掃」街任務後,金剛與小儀成功從多位高廚身上學到精湛廚藝。來到最後一集,兩位主持決定來一場「終極PK賽」,以蝦作題目比拼誰是「街坊廚神」中的皇者。從設計菜式、選購食材,以至下廚烹調,整個過程都由他們一手包辦,務
programme.desc: 求以個人實力擊倒對方。由於今次賽事名譽攸關 ,他們分別請來廚藝了得的黃宗澤,以及「地獄廚神」周秀娜擔任星級助手,到底兩位助手能否協助他們致勝?這場港、台大戰最終又會鹿死誰手?

programme.title: 香港本色[粵]
The Heritage Of Hong Kong[Can]
programme.sub-title: 金雕、玉雕、牙雕已成夕陽行業,一班手藝非凡的老師傅,如何為這些傳統工藝「守尾門」?一塊金磚,由熔金到打磨,每個步驟都要一絲不苟,打金師傅胡文楷卻稱學習了「批、鑲、卓、鑿」已稱得上滿師,但要怎樣才能獨當一面?經過師傅悉心設計,一
programme.desc: 塊石頭,隨時會變成價值連成的寶玉!何以香蕉、燒肉、龍蝦等亦能成為精緻的玉器擺設?牙雕業在國際實施象牙禁運後面臨重大衝擊,何以朱忠盛仍堅持守護這門即將絕跡的手藝?

programme.title: 動物重生記 #13
Second Chance Pets #13
programme.sub-title: Second Chance Pets will inspire and educate anyone interested in animal science, engineering, and where the two intersect. Dr. Jim Alaimo, owner of My Pet’s Brace in Pennsylvania, is
programme.desc: Second Chance Pets will inspire and educate anyone interested in animal science, engineering, and where the two intersect. Dr. Jim Alaimo, owner of My Pet’s Brace in Pennsylvania, is one of the leading animal prosthetists in the world. Dr. Alaimo and his world renowned team have saved thousands of animals by creating one-of-a-kind prosthetics and braces that give them a new leash on life. This heartwarming program covers the medical side of Dr. Alaimo’s profession when dealing with different dog injuries. We follow the science and engineering side as well, with every brace and prosthetic posing unique challenges. Along with that, the show will shine a light on various dog breeds, teaching the audience about the unique and distinct features that make each dog different.

programme.title: Open Season: Call of...#20
Open Season: Call of Nature #20
programme.sub-title: When Boog and Elliot discover an abandoned Summer Camp in the middle of nowhere, they embark on a brave new adventure of creating a safe and special place to live that welcomes
programme.desc: When Boog and Elliot discover an abandoned Summer Camp in the middle of nowhere, they embark on a brave new adventure of creating a safe and special place to live that welcomes animals of every kind. They're about to discover, that while it's one thing living in the wild... it's another thing entirely to build a community from scratch. Our adorably entertaining cast of animals are going to need rules, roles, alliances and ways of collaborating that they've never really attempted before. I mean, we can't just have Campers eating one another, right? It's not long before Boog, Elliot and the others discover, that creating a community out of nothing is harder than you'd imagine. And keeping everyone happy all the time is practically impossible! Open Season Call Of Nature is a returnable sitcom format show filled with absurd, entertaining and hilarious stories about the challenges of learning to live alongside one another, no matter what your species is or appetites may be. Under the leadership of Boog and Elliot, the Campers must all work together to help create their own slice of paradise in the middle of the wilderness.

programme.title: 超級隧道工程 #2
Super Tunnel #2
programme.sub-title: This series follows a team of more than ten thousand engineers and construction workers as they race to build a brand new railway under London – Crossrail – London’s new Underground. Costing
programme.desc: This series follows a team of more than ten thousand engineers and construction workers as they race to build a brand new railway under London – Crossrail – London’s new Underground. Costing fifteen billion pounds, it’s the biggest engineering project in Europe and a huge challenge to pull off. As they burrow the forty-two kilometers of tunnels, engineers must battle to make sure that listed buildings don’t crack, London Underground trains keep running, roads don’t shut and the City stays in business. Crucially, they must drive one of their gigantic 1000-tonne tunnel boring machines through a tiny gap in the congested underbelly of Tottenham Court Road station without the passengers on the tube platforms below knowing they are there.

programme.sub-title: This series follows a team of more than ten thousand engineers and construction workers as they race to build a brand new railway under London – Crossrail – London’s new Underground.
programme.desc: This series follows a team of more than ten thousand engineers and construction workers as they race to build a brand new railway under London – Crossrail – London’s new Underground. Costing fifteen billion pounds, it’s the biggest engineering project in Europe and a huge challenge to pull off. As they burrow the forty-two kilometers of tunnels, engineers must battle to make sure that listed buildings don’t crack, London Underground trains keep running, roads don’t shut and the City stays in business. Crucially, they must drive one of their gigantic 1000-tonne tunnel boring machines through a tiny gap in the congested underbelly of Tottenham Court Road station without the passengers on the tube platforms below knowing they are there.

programme.title: Open Season: Call of...#22
Open Season: Call of Nature #22
programme.sub-title: When Boog and Elliot discover an abandoned Summer Camp in the middle of nowhere, they embark on a brave new adventure of creating a safe and special place to live that welcomes
programme.desc: When Boog and Elliot discover an abandoned Summer Camp in the middle of nowhere, they embark on a brave new adventure of creating a safe and special place to live that welcomes animals of every kind. They're about to discover, that while it's one thing living in the wild... it's another thing entirely to build a community from scratch. Our adorably entertaining cast of animals are going to need rules, roles, alliances and ways of collaborating that they've never really attempted before. I mean, we can't just have Campers eating one another, right? It's not long before Boog, Elliot and the others discover, that creating a community out of nothing is harder than you'd imagine. And keeping everyone happy all the time is practically impossible! Open Season Call Of Nature is a returnable sitcom format show filled with absurd, entertaining and hilarious stories about the challenges of learning to live alongside one another, no matter what your species is or appetites may be. Under the leadership of Boog and Elliot, the Campers must all work together to help create their own slice of paradise in the middle of the wilderness.

Cooking Italy #10
programme.sub-title: The series follows Chefs Rob Rossi and Craig Harding as they travel to incredible and often overlooked regions of Italy. From the ancient wonders of Sardinia, to the seaside delights of
programme.desc: The series follows Chefs Rob Rossi and Craig Harding as they travel to incredible and often overlooked regions of Italy. From the ancient wonders of Sardinia, to the seaside delights of Naples, to the beauty of Tuscany and more, the Chefs meet local farmers and artisans, experience delicious food made with methods passed down through generations, and use fresh local ingredients from the sea and soil to put their own spin on classic Italian dishes.

programme.title: 世一鐵路導賞團 2 #16
World’s Most Scenic Railway Journeys S2 #16
programme.sub-title: From the wintery wonderland in Finland to the majestic volcanoes of New Zealand, we will be taking twenty very individual and stunningly beautiful train journeys.
programme.desc: From the wintery wonderland in Finland to the majestic volcanoes of New Zealand, we will be taking twenty very individual and stunningly beautiful train journeys. On each one we’ll meet the people who work and live along these special rail lines in many different countries –Including South Africa, Mexico, Scotland, France, Sri Lanka and New Zealand. We’ll explore the natural wonders along the route, meet the engineers who keep the trains running, and historians who reveal the challenges the builders faced when constructing these magnificent feats of engineering. These are no ordinary train trips, these are some of the most scenic rail journeys in the World!

programme.title: 黃金組合 2 #7
Winning Combination S2 #7
programme.sub-title: From the makers of The Chase comes an all-new quiz show that sees contestants compete to be part of the Winning Combination. Presented by Omid Djalili, this perfect storm of players,
programme.desc: From the makers of The Chase comes an all-new quiz show that sees contestants compete to be part of the Winning Combination. Presented by Omid Djalili, this perfect storm of players, money and general knowledge questions could see four players walk away with some serious cash. In each episode, the game begins with each contestant drawing a number from one to nine. General knowledge battles whittle the players - and numbers - down to four. In the final round, their four numbers represent not only the four-digit jackpot they could share, but also how many questions they must answer correctly against the clock. The bigger the jackpot, the harder it is to win! With speedy buzzer rounds, fiendish multiple choice questions and tactical play, there's something for every quiz fan. Who has what it takes to be part of the Winning Combination?

programme.title: 芭蕾媽媽之夢 (PG)
Colliding Forces : Mothers in Ballet(PG)
programme.sub-title: Eliza Schroeder’s new film shines a truly spectacular light on the issues facing all working moms, with a particular focus on the strength of mind and body required of
programme.desc: Eliza Schroeder’s new film shines a truly spectacular light on the issues facing all working moms, with a particular focus on the strength of mind and body required of prima ballerinas. Beautiful and compelling, Eliza’s film follows Begona Cao, Mary-Helen Bowers, Karina Gonzalez and Tara-Brigitte Bhavnani on their journey of physical and mental agony and ecstasy and we learn about the sacrifices they make in order to succeed in a world that needs to accommodate working mothers yet doesn’t know how to. And ultimately, how, in the face of such conflict, Miyako Yoshida (Artistic Director of Ballet & Dance at the New National Theater Tokyo) offers insight into why motherhood and ballet simply weren’t mutually compatible for her.

programme.sub-title: From the makers of The Chase comes an all-new quiz show that sees contestants compete to be part of the Winning Combination. Presented by Omid Djalili, this perfect storm of
programme.desc: From the makers of The Chase comes an all-new quiz show that sees contestants compete to be part of the Winning Combination. Presented by Omid Djalili, this perfect storm of players, money and general knowledge questions could see four players walk away with some serious cash. In each episode, the game begins with each contestant drawing a number from one to nine. General knowledge battles whittle the players - and numbers - down to four. In the final round, their four numbers represent not only the four-digit jackpot they could share, but also how many questions they must answer correctly against the clock. The bigger the jackpot, the harder it is to win! With speedy buzzer rounds, fiendish multiple choice questions and tactical play, there's something for every quiz fan. Who has what it takes to be part of the Winning Combination?

programme.title: Open Season: Call of...#23
Open Season: Call of Nature #23
programme.sub-title: When Boog and Elliot discover an abandoned Summer Camp in the middle of nowhere, they embark on a brave new adventure of creating a safe and special place to live that welcomes
programme.desc: When Boog and Elliot discover an abandoned Summer Camp in the middle of nowhere, they embark on a brave new adventure of creating a safe and special place to live that welcomes animals of every kind. They're about to discover, that while it's one thing living in the wild... it's another thing entirely to build a community from scratch. Our adorably entertaining cast of animals are going to need rules, roles, alliances and ways of collaborating that they've never really attempted before. I mean, we can't just have Campers eating one another, right? It's not long before Boog, Elliot and the others discover, that creating a community out of nothing is harder than you'd imagine. And keeping everyone happy all the time is practically impossible! Open Season Call Of Nature is a returnable sitcom format show filled with absurd, entertaining and hilarious stories about the challenges of learning to live alongside one another, no matter what your species is or appetites may be. Under the leadership of Boog and Elliot, the Campers must all work together to help create their own slice of paradise in the middle of the wilderness.

programme.desc: 鍋,錫紙上的魚被燒焦碳化了。清香患老人痴呆大約一年。知道了這一點,中迂想起了他的母親。每次接電話時,清香似乎因為健忘,所以都會錄音,錄音中幾乎全部都是清香的聲音。在清香的預計死亡時間,繼秀和在印刷公司工作的田瀨葵小姐一起吃飯。風間和中迂前去拜訪田瀨,並得知繼秀與往常不同,叫了高級套餐,並且他聽說妻子不見了戒指很失望。風間告訴中迂「做出不同於平常的行為,就代表著有異物入侵了生活」...

programme.title: 今天只做1件事 #138

programme.sub-title: 傳聞中的「賣慘婆婆」再次被發現!哭訴喪夫喪子又無錢買藥買飯食,令不少香港善心人自願送錢。本集Mishy、子健和Keyman三人以「賣慘」為題,分析如何明辨慘事的是與非。認真專員更加找來戲劇老師兼苦
programme.desc: 主之一YEM袁綺雯拆解「賣慘婆婆」的劇本和中招原因,並由專員進行實測香港人的愛心多少!

programme.title: 今晚煮邊科 #229

programme.desc: 攝現場,搶觀眾眼球!Gthan密謀瞞著正為著Channel經費而頭痛的Michelle來一個先斬後奏,即使Anna突然遇到意外no show,Gthan跟Jacky還是照樣出發。但一段開頭就透露着不順的旅程豈能如意?Jacky和Gthan在日本遭遇連環不幸事件,走到山窮水盡。二人眼見「想紅」的道路越來越艱辛,曾一度想放棄,但就在二人懷疑人生時,Gthan越到扭轉命運的瞬間,重新憶起三上老師的教誨,繼續「去吧唔好停」!

programme.desc: 心到深圳重新出發。 她更有計畫開分店,將香港的美味和情懷傳播到更多地方。

programme.desc: 本本錄製「THE FIRST TAKE」的第一位歌手陳柏宇獻唱,為他們打氣。

programme.title: 給香港的情書 貳 #10
In Love with their own Hong Kong S2 #10
programme.sub-title: 藝術與文化在今時今日可以透過不同的方式去呈現,它們的共同點是可以用不同平台或者各式各樣的手法表達對這個社會的感受。時代不斷變化,技術和創作工具縱使不同,但各個領域、各個年代的創作人仍然積極地以創作
programme.desc: 互相溝通。這次我們再次邀請不同文化藝術界別的朋友,細道他們的故事,透過自己的作品去分享自己對香港的感覺,寫下對香港的留言。創作者在節目中為「未來的香港」寫下自己的情書,也對這個地方留下一個啟發性的問題,讓觀眾可以同時思考未來的可能性。不同的嘉賓、不同的身份,給香港說出不一樣的感情。

programme.desc: 真係會參觀一個日本庭園!「喺土耳其嘅京都庭園」,土耳其真係充滿住令人興奮嘅黑人問號!最後兩位女神華麗變身,趕到世界級景點Salt Lake,欣賞無盡頭嘅日落!

programme.title: 磚造美學 #37
Brick da house #37
programme.sub-title: 《磚造美學》旨在為觀眾提供有關家居設計和裝修的實用建議和靈感。該節目的主要目標是幫助人們打造舒適、實用和美觀的居住環境。節目會展示設計師的創意和專業技巧,包括如何最大限度地利用空間、選擇合適家具和裝飾品、使用合適
programme.desc: 的色彩和材料,以及如何創造一個舒適、時尚且個性化的居住環境。另外,節目會聚焦於一個家庭或個人的居住環境,透過參觀素人的家,了解他們對自己的家所花的心思,拼湊出一幅幅家居美畫。節目也會介紹簡單實用的裝潢技巧和D.I.Y項目,使觀眾在能夠有限的預算和時間下,對自己的家進行翻新。

programme.title: 阿媽有咗第二個
Mama's Affair
programme.sub-title: 多年前曾一手捧紅多位巨星的歌手經理人美鳳(毛舜筠 飾),婚後選擇全面告別職場,專心相夫教子。如今兒子子軒(柳應廷 飾)即將到外國升讀大學,美鳳決定重出江湖,藉以尋回人生價值。一次偶然機會,美鳳認識了在茶餐廳送外賣
programme.desc: 的方晴(姜濤 飾),發現他在演藝方面極具潛能,決心將他推向舞台,果然短時間就成功令他成為大眾偶像,令美鳳職場上鋒芒再露。身世孤苦的方晴激發了美鳳的母愛照顧,卻令兒子感到被冷落,揭開了母子長年未解的感情裂痕。

programme.title: Show肌 #6(PG)
Muscle Show #6(PG)
programme.sub-title: 大腿肌是人體中最大肌群之一,而且是身體發力的重要支柱。今集的達人是有多年石油氣送貨經驗的雄哥,他能踩著一架載有七罐石油氣單車穿梭大街小巷,將石油氣送上十層樓梯的唐樓都游刃有餘,全靠多年來練得的一雙
programme.desc: 金鋼大腿。三位Agent Muscle今集要抵抗地心吸力,徘迴在與大地親吻的邊緣,挑戰由MJ經典舞步改編的45度半身前傾——《膕繩肌的掙扎》。隨著年紀漸長,身體肌肉量也會愈漸減少兼且功能衰退,嚴重的可能會演變成「肌少症」。「影室孖寶」——林師傅和石師傅年齡相差十幾歲,較年長的林師傅竟然擁有更多的大腿肌肉量!到底是甚麼原因造成二人的大腿肌肉量有反差比?專家將會解答有關肌肉流失的問題,以及教授家居大腿訓練操。

Stages of Marriage #3
programme.sub-title: 環球情侶Hiro和Nat七年前放棄香港一切,花盡積蓄實踐環遊世界之夢,過程中對非洲留下深刻印象;七年後,他們以夫妻身份重遊南非,大談二人婚姻愛情觀與夢想。來到約翰奈斯堡馬背safari,體會人與動物同樣需要「尊重
programme.desc: 」。一同到「獅子園」為野生獅子作保育,與小獅漫步,談及生兒育女大計,透露讀萬卷書不如行萬里路的教育方針。佻望「三茅屋」、「波克幸運壼」、「上帝之窗」壯麗美景,Nat透露當年曾為Hiro的環遊世界瘋狂大計經歷心理掙扎,Hiro慶幸遇到跟他浪跡天涯的終生伴侶。離開約翰內斯堡,向北部城市普利托里亞出發,回「家」探望當年親切招待二人的南白人夫婦,以粵式家常菜進行文化交流,男主外女主內,Nat重掌「權力」,過程中更談及梳化客之特點。南非家庭與Hiro和Nat感情匪淺,一同共進晚餐,悠揚溫馨。

programme.title: 貓之旅神 #7

programme.desc: 從認識DNA結構開始,學習讀取當中的隱藏信息吧!

programme.desc: ,本節目特派「認真專員」探討各大議題,揭露背後真相。事無鉅細都要認真研究,讓你會心微笑。
